questions.question: Considering the primary function, what is the overall purpose of this item, judging solely by its visual attributes?

Describing the texture, is the main strap section smooth, rough, or something else?

What seems to be the shape of the primary strap section as it is visually presented?

What is the general shape of the metal hook at the end of the strap, based on its appearance?

Describing the buckle, what is the apparent texture of its surface?
Based purely on visual cues, what is the apparent thickness of the main strap?
